amendment.description: Amendment nominated Democratic candidates for Officers of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Larson (CT) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Larson (CT).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Larson (CT) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Larson (CT) amendment (A001) Failed by voice vote.
